relatedBlades.title: GartnerÂ®: 2022 Strategic Roadmap for SASE Convergence
relatedBlades.copy:
![Gartner 2022 Strategic Roadmap for SASE Convergence Hero Image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/HxIWybHLlMtPOkiyA1F5z/d6d2b5cae69b19c9e89fe874312ab756/Gartner_SASE_2022.png)

Cloud computing and work-from-anywhere initiatives have permanently shifted enterprise access requirements and accelerated interest in migrating to a SASE architecture. However, security modernization and network transformation can take several years to complete, especially as security and risk management leaders navigate challenges with existing infrastructure and vendor contracts, skill gaps, and segmented network and security teams. 

In its 2022 Strategic Roadmap for SASE Convergence, Gartner provides an example migration plan split into high, medium, and low priority initiatives over the next several years.

Read the full report to help you:

- Pursue organizational changes that will increase your likelihood of success with a SASE migration
- Navigate the current state of market maturity and related vendor gaps
- Implement Zero Trust security principles while keeping complexity manageable
- Tailor a 3-5 year SASE roadmap to your specific business requirements
